name: Martin Morlock
part_bio: Son of Mary (Martin) and Albert Morlock. At the bottom of the stone it reads "Donated body to Science".
bio:
MORLOCK Mary C. Martin
1875-1949
wife of Albert Morlock
1877-1966
thier son

donated body to science
Charlott Jans
wife of N. Beaver
died Aug. 4, 1907
aged 92 years 6 mos. 16 ds.

1849-1936

Alter 72 Jahre 2 monate 9 tage.
